com.bring.api.connection

Interface BringConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBringConnection, HttpClient3Adapter, HttpClient4Adapter, HttpUrlConnectionAdapter

    public interface BringConnection
    Interface for abstracting the http client framework to use.
